org.fxmisc.richtext

Interface TextEditingArea<PS,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of style that can be applied to text.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClipboardActions<PS,S>, EditActions<PS,S>, NavigationActions<PS,S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeArea, InlineCssTextArea, InlineStyleTextArea, StyleClassedTextArea, StyledTextArea

    public interface TextEditingArea<PS,S>
    Interface for a text editing control. Defines the core methods. Other interfaces define default higher-level methods implemented on top of the core methods.

    • Method Detail

      • getLength

        int getLength()
        The number of characters in this text-editing area.

      • lengthProperty

        ObservableValue<Integer> lengthProperty()
        See Also:
        getLength()

      • getText

        String getText()
        Text content of this text-editing area.

      • textProperty

        ObservableValue<String> textProperty()
        See Also:
        getText()

      • getDocument

        StyledDocument<PS,S> getDocument()
        Rich-text content of this text-editing area. The returned document is immutable, it does not reflect subsequent edits of this text-editing area.

      • getCaretPosition

        int getCaretPosition()
        The current position of the caret, as a character offset in the text. Most of the time, caret is at the boundary of the selection (if there is any selection). However, there are circumstances when the caret is positioned inside or outside the selected text. For example, when the user is dragging the selected text, the caret moves with the cursor to point at the position where the selected text moves upon release.

      • caretPositionProperty

        ObservableValue<Integer> caretPositionProperty()
        See Also:
        getCaretPosition()

      • getAnchor

        int getAnchor()
        The anchor of the selection. If there is no selection, this is the same as caret position.

      • anchorProperty

        ObservableValue<Integer> anchorProperty()
        See Also:
        getAnchor()

      • getSelection

        IndexRange getSelection()
        The selection range. One boundary is always equal to anchor, and the other one is most of the time equal to caret position.

      • selectionProperty

        ObservableValue<IndexRange> selectionProperty()
        See Also:
        getSelection()

      • getSelectedText

        String getSelectedText()
        The selected text.

      • selectedTextProperty

        ObservableValue<String> selectedTextProperty()
        See Also:
        getSelectedText()

      • getCurrentParagraph

        int getCurrentParagraph()
        Index of the current paragraph, i.e. the paragraph with the caret.

      • currentParagraphProperty

        ObservableValue<Integer> currentParagraphProperty()
        See Also:
        getCurrentParagraph()

      • getCaretColumn

        int getCaretColumn()
        The caret position within the current paragraph.

      • caretColumnProperty

        ObservableValue<Integer> caretColumnProperty()
        See Also:
        getCaretColumn()

      • getParagraphs

        ObservableList<Paragraph<PS,S>> getParagraphs()

        Returns text content of the given paragraph.

               int end)

        Returns rich-text content of the given paragraph.

                                 int end)
        Returns rich-text content of the given character range.

      • selectRange

        void selectRange(int anchor,
                 int caretPosition)
        Positions the anchor and caretPosition explicitly, effectively creating a selection.

      • replaceText

        void replaceText(int start,
                 int end,
                 String text)
        Replaces a range of characters with the given text. It must hold 0 <= start <= end <= getLength().
        Parameters:
        start - Start index of the range to replace, inclusive.
        end - End index of the range to replace, exclusive.
        text - The text to put in place of the deleted range. It must not be null.

      • replace

        void replace(int start,
             int end,
             StyledDocument<PS,S> replacement)
        Replaces a range of characters with the given rich-text document.

      • replaceText

        default void replaceText(IndexRange range,
                         String text)
        Replaces a range of characters with the given text.
        Parameters:
        range - The range to replace. It must not be null.
        text - The text to put in place of the deleted range. It must not be null.
        See Also:
        replaceText(int, int, String)

      • replace

        default void replace(IndexRange range,
                     StyledDocument<PS,S> replacement)
        Equivalent to replace(range.getStart(), range.getEnd(), replacement).

      • positionCaret

        @Deprecated
void positionCaret(int pos)
        Deprecated. You probably meant to use NavigationActions.moveTo(int). This method will be made package-private in the future
        Positions only the caret. Doesn't move the anchor and doesn't change the selection. Can be used to achieve the special case of positioning the caret outside or inside the selection, as opposed to always being at the boundary. Use with care.
